<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 441, 718, 456]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 457, 320, 471]]<|/det|>
Write in dark blue or black pen.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 472, 464, 486]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 487, 598, 501]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 502, 380, 516]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 532, 254, 546]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 547, 652, 561]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 562, 380, 575]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 577, 892, 605]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 606, 450, 619]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 635, 606, 650]]<|/det|>
